bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Tápiz was the 12th Bishop of Durango, appointed in 1712.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Photocopy of transcribed typescript report concerning the missions throughout the Durango bishopric.
Visita de este Obispado de Durango.
